Books

Beyond BIOS: Developing with the Unified Extensible Firmware Interface - Marisetty, S., Rothman, M., & Zimmer, V. - Intel Press. - (66,55€)

The Rootkit Arsenal: Escape and Evasion in the Dark Corners of the System - Blunden, B. - Jones & Bartlett Learning. - (85€)
